A portfolio template crafted for developers and designers to present their profile, showcase achievements, and share personal projects.

### Features

- Hero Section with Introduction
- Skills Section
- Experience Section
- Portfolio/Projects Section
- Certifications Section
- Achievements Section
- Testimonials Section
- Contact Section
- Blog

### Tech Stack

  technologies={[

  ]}
/>
